# Workshop with Web UI
* Code Generated from [Lovable](https://lovable.dev) 
    * Vite
    * TypeScript
    * React
    * shadcn-ui
    * Tailwind CSS

## 1. Install and start project
```
$npm install

# Start with development mode
$npm run dev
```

Open URL in browser
* http://localhost:8080/

Build tp production
```
$npm run build
```
